data.name: ClickHere
data.comment: Used for hyperlinks on the confirmation page.

data.name: CreateNewPersonOrFindExistingPrompt
data.value: Would you like to create a new person record or find an existing person to assign?

data.name: DetailsForPersonUpdatedSuccessfully
data.comment: Includes a required parameter to insert a person's name.

data.name: EditOrChangeAssignedPersonPrompt
data.value: Would you like to edit the assigned person record or change the assigned person?

data.name: EmailConfirmationSuccessful
data.value: Email confirmed! You can now log in using your credentials.

data.name: EmailNotConfirmed
data.comment: Requesting user has not confirmed their email address. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.EmailNotConfirmed.

data.name: ExpiredToken
data.value: Provided authentication token has expired or has been revoked.
data.comment: The authentication token supplied in the request has expired or has been revoked. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.ExpiredToken.

data.name: FailedToAssignPersonToUser
data.value: Failed to assign person to user.

data.name: FailedToGetInvitationCodeForUser
data.value: Failed to get invitation code for user.

data.name: FailedToRetrieveCurrentUserDetails
data.value: Failed to retrieve current user details.

data.name: FailedToSetRolesForUser
data.value: Failed to set roles for user.

data.name: GreetingAfternoon
data.comment: Includes an optional parameter to insert a person's name.

data.name: GreetingEvening
data.comment: Includes an optional parameter to insert a person's name.

data.name: GreetingGeneric
data.comment: Includes an optional parameter to insert a person's name.

data.name: GreetingMorning
data.comment: Includes an optional parameter to insert a person's name.

data.name: InsufficientUserRole
data.comment: Requesting user does not have the required user role(s) to carry out an operation. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.InsufficientUserRole.

data.name: InvalidToken
data.comment: Taken from ErrorResponseCode.InvalidToken.

data.name: InvalidUsernameOrPassword
data.comment: Requesting user has provided an invalid username or password. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.InvalidUsernameOrPassword.

data.name: LogoutSuccessful
data.value: You are now logged out. Thank you for using MartialBase®!

data.name: NoAccessToPerson
data.value: Requesting user has no access to requested person.
data.comment: Requesting user is attempting to access a Person who is not in an organisation or school which the requesting user is an admin/secretary of. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.NoAccessToPerson.

data.name: NoAssociatedPerson
data.value: Requesting user has no associated person.
data.comment: Requesting user has no associated Person record (needed to check membership of schools/organisations). Taken from ErrorResponseCode.NoAssociatedPerson.

data.name: NoOrganisationAccess
data.value: Requesting user has no access to organisation.
data.comment: Requesting user is attempting to interact with an organisation for which they do not have access. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.NoOrganisationAccess.

data.name: NotOrganisationAdmin
data.value: Requesting user is not admin of organisation.
data.comment: Requesting user is attempting to access an organisation for which they are not an admin. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.NotOrganisationAdmin.

data.name: NotSchoolSecretary
data.value: Requesting user is not a school secretary.
data.comment: Requesting user is attempting to access a school of which they are not a secretary. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.NotSchoolSecretary.

data.name: NotSchoolStudent
data.value: Requesting user is not a school student.
data.comment: Requesting user is attempting to access a school of which they are not a student. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.NotSchoolStudent.

data.name: OrphanPersonEntity
data.comment: A person entity which depends on a parent cannot be removed if it has no other parent e.g. a person who is member of only one organisation can only be removed if they already belong to another organisation. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.OrphanPersonEntity.

data.name: OrphanSchoolEntity
data.comment: A school entity which depends on a parent cannot be removed if it has no other parent e.g. a school who's organisation is being deleted first needs to be moved to another organisation or deleted itself. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.OrphanSchoolEntity.

data.name: PersonAddedToUser
data.comment: Includes a required parameter to insert a person's name.

data.name: RegisterNewUser
data.value: Registration submitted. Please check your emails for a confirmation link.

data.name: ResetRequestSent
data.value: Password reset request sent. Please check your emails for a confirmation link.

data.name: ResetSuccess
data.value: Password reset successfully! You can now log in using your new credentials.

data.name: ToReturnToLogin
data.value: to return to the login page.
data.comment: Used to append to hyperlinks on the confirmation page.

data.name: UnknownError
data.comment: Taken from ErrorResponseCode.UnknownError.

data.name: UserLockedOut
data.value: Account has been locked out, please try again in 10 minutes.
data.comment: Requesting user has been locked out. Taken from ErrorResponseCode.UserLockedOut.
